fields.description:
Description:
WebView "Back" button does not work. Only first attempt to go back fails.
Bug occurs on 2.0.0 and 1.8.2.

Steps:
1. Run attached app
2. Press "Goto Second page"
3. Press "Back" button

Expected result:
Should be able to go back from second to first page.

Actual result:
Unable to come back from second to first page by pressing "Back" button
fields.summary: iOS: WebView "Back" button does not respond correctly
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.1.201204101854
SDK: 2.0.1.v20120410103239
Device: iPad 2 (4.3.5)

comments.body:
Issue reproduces on
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 

Tested with
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0

it works fine on
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2
